$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|I appreciate your enthusiasm, Ike,
I do, but...don't get too excited.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Are you sure we have to follow all
the tournament's rules? It's just...
there are so many of them...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|It does seem seeing Commander Greil
again has put you in high spirits, Ike!
Just try to stay focused out there.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|High spirits, hm? What gave it away?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|Whenever you're in a good mood,
your mouth does this thing wh— Hey!
Over there!$k$pThey must be our opponents, then.
Now it's our turn, Ike. Shall we?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Valentine19,Face|We're outnumbered, Ike! Let's retreat
and regroup with Commander Greil,
Mist, and Titania!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Good call, Soren. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|
